headline: Fortinet (FTNT): Exploring Current Valuation After Recent Share Price Recovery
summary: Fortinet (FTNT) stock has recently experienced some ups and downs, catching the eye of investors interested in cybersecurity. In the past month, the stock is up 8%, while its year-to-date return remains negative. See our latest analysis for Fortinet. Stepping back, Fortinet’s 1-month share price return of nearly 8% reflects renewed optimism around cybersecurity stocks. However, this rally comes after a tough stretch, with shares still down more than 21% over the past quarter. While momentum...
